scripts.build:ui: @powershell if(Test-Path build) {Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build} && cd ../Fullstack-Course/part02/lab-exercises/notes-app && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../../../Fullstack-Course-Notes-Backend
scripts.deploy: git add -A && git commit -m "Commit and push from Deploy Script" && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
